We remind you that responses generated by the Chatbot may contain inaccurate information due to technical failures and errors, as well as insufficient development level of artificial intelligence. The responses you receive do not represent the official position of LLC "ALOR +", its management, and/or individual employees. The Chatbot does not provide investment advisory services or offer personalized investment recommendations. You bear all risks associated with making decisions about how and when to use information obtained from the Chatbot.

For more accurate information, please contact us by phone at 8 800 775-11-99 (ext. 3), +7 495 981-55-77 (ext. 3), and/or by email at [client@alor.ru](mailto:client@alor.ru)
